T02D2180:37b-0: @37b * // gsad pa'i sbyin sreg sbyor ka ni //
T02D2180:37b-1: thab khung gru gsum kha dog gnag / rdo rje gri gug nang dang steng //
T02D2180:37b-2: bar du me ri rtse mo 'phags //
T02D2180:37b-3: bdud rtsi la sogs tshon rtsi byug / bud shing nag po tsher ma can //
T02D2180:37b-4: yam shing de mthun bcu gnyis tshad //
T02D2180:37b-5: mchod rdzas la sogs nag po shis //
T02D2180:37b-6: tshil chen mar nag la sogs pa'i//
T02D2180:37b-7: khyad par gdong pa can gyi sha //
T02D2180:37b-8: rgyud las byung ba'i sreg rdzas shis //
T02D2180:37b-9: nam phyed nyin phyed dus dag tu //
T02D2180:37b-10: sa gzhi mtho ba'i stan dag la //
T02D2180:37b-11: brkyang bskum la sogs rgyan cha rdzogs //
T02D2180:37b-12: bskyed rim tshul du byas nas ni //
T02D2180:37b-13: me sbar la sogs cho ga bya //
T02D2180:37b-14: me lha gang 'dod bskyed nas ni //
T02D2180:37b-15: ye shes spyan drangs mchod sogs dbul //
T02D2180:37b-16: rnal 'byor sbyor ka'i man ngag ni //
T02D2180:37b-17: 'di ni shin tu zab ces pas //
T02D2180:37b-18: gzu lums rtog ge dgag pa'i phyir //
T02D2180:37b-19: slob dpon zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02D2180:37b-20: lha yi cho ga rdzogs nas ni //
T02D2180:37b-21: me lha bsams te bsang byas la //
T02D2180:38a-0: rdzas rnams thams cad bsdus nas @38a * //
T02D2180:38a-2: cho ga la sogs rdzogs bya'o //
